title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.53 - Executive Order No. 53: Amending the Executive Orders of March 6, 1970 [No. 36] and April 2, 1971 [No. 50] relating to the Manpower Resources Commission. [*]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.53 - Executive Order No. 53: Amending the Executive Orders of March 6, 1970 [No. 36] and April 2, 1971 [No. 50] relating to the Manpower Resources Commission. [*]
State Regulations
I, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Governor of the State of New

York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Laws of
the State of New York, do hereby direct by Executive Order that the initial
paragraph of the Executive Order of March 6, 1970, establishing the Manpower

Resources Commission, as amended by the Executive Order of April 2, 1971, be
further amended to read as follows: I, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Governor of the State of New

York, by virtue of the authority vested in me by the Constitution and Laws of
the State of New York, do hereby establish in the Executive Department a

Manpower Resources Commission to provide centralized leadership and direction
in manpower training, to consist of the Industrial Commissioner as chairman, the Commissioners of Education, Commerce, Environmental Conservation, Correctional Services, Social Services, Local Government, and Human Rights, the

President of the State Civil Service Commission, the President of the State

University, the Director of the Division for Youth, and the Chairman of the

Narcotic Addiction Control Commission. Signed: Nelson A. Rockefeller

Dated: March 20, 1972

Footnotes
*
[Amends Executive Order Nos. 36 and 50, supra. ]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1.53

Amends Executive Order

Nos. 36 and 50, supra. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
